item.title: Using Conky to Generate Lemonbar Statusline
item.description: Introduction According to its GitHub page, Lemonbar (formerly known as bar) is a lightweight bar entirely based on XCB. Provides full UTF-8 support, basic formatting, RandR and Xinerama support and EWMH compliance without wasting your precious memory. I use Debian, and Lemonbar is available in Debian repository since Stretch, so just install it normally. 1 sudo apt-get install lemonbar It just a bar. It doesn’t come with any module like in Polybar by default.
